QuestData.Title: Deep Mine Rescue
QuestData.Description: <You can hear Dumass speaking through the webbing.>$B$BHI! SPIDERS EVERYWHERE! THE CAPTAIN SENT ME TO SAVE THE WORLD AND CAPTURE HUMANS! WHAT IS THIS PLACE ANYWAY? IT'S SO HOT! I...$B$B<Dumass goes on and on about his situation.>$B$BPerhaps you should cut him free and get him back to safety. Or you can just leave him here, though it's your fault that he's stuck in this mine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Captain Keyton at the Azurelode Mine in Hillsbrad Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: Have you ever heard the saying "survival of the fittest?" What you're doing conflicts with natural law, $g buddy:lady;! This idiot should have died in the mines. There's no telling what kind of harm he'll cause to himself or another person now that you've saved him from his inevitable demise.$B$BAnd you know who's fault that'll be, right?
